name: GUN FIGHTERS (Spinbab)
description:
GUN FIGHTERS is a 2D fighter. It is an AMAZING fighter at that.

This game includes a wide variety of characters.

Some characters include: Sans, Spider-Man, Donald McRonald, and MORTON!!!

This game was developed by only 2 PEOPLE!!! :O (You must be shocked!)

Prepare for a journey through Arcade mode, where you fight the toughest of enemies, such as PEPSI MAN.

Some characters were made especially for this game!!! Such as: Brotaro, B R U H and wade wad!!!

Stay tuned throughout the JOURNEY of GUN FIGHTERS!!!
